item.title: Getting started with orchardcms
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting orchardcms set up or installed. Choosing a theme # Out line for details find a theme you like in the gallery install theme activate theme *need to add screen shots. Introduction to Orchard # Orchard is a free, open source, community-focused Content Management System built on the ASP.NET MVC platform. Orchard is built on a modern architecture that puts extensibility up-front, as its number one concern.
